name: Eggs Benedict
steps:
Split and toast English muffins.
Warm ham slices in a pan.
Poach eggs in simmering water for 3-4 minutes.
Melt butter in a double boiler.
Whisk egg yolks with lemon juice over heat.
Slowly add melted butter while whisking to make hollandaise.
Season with cayenne and salt.
Assemble: muffin, ham, poached egg, hollandaise sauce.
